meanings.definition: A plant of the figwort family, typically with brightly colored flowers.
meanings.sent1: The nemesia in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted a nemesia in my backyard for its colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn in the nemesia pot.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as a nemesia in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The nemesia's petals danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the figwort family, native to southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The nemesia genus includes many species found in southern Africa.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the different species within the nemesia genus.
meanings.sent3: The explorer was amazed to discover a new species of nemesia during his expedition.
meanings.sent4: In the vast garden of nature, the nemesia genus stands out like a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The nemesia plants swayed gracefully under the African sun.
